Detailed Description

cvmx_srio::_tx_ctrl

This register is used to control SRIO outgoing packet allocation. TAG_TH[2:0] set the thresholds to allow priority traffic requiring responses to be queued based on the number of outgoing tags (TIDs) available. 16 Tags are available. If a priority is blocked for lack of tags then all lower priority packets are also blocked regardless of whether they require tags.

This register is reset by the h-clock reset.
